info.name: Event Now - Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Event Now application including Authentication, Place Categories, Places, Ratings, Favorites, Bookings, Offers, and Activities (Upcoming & Live Events with Automatic Scheduler)

Update activity details. All fields are optional. Only creator can update. Cannot update completed or cancelled activities.

Cancel an activity. Only creator can cancel. Cannot cancel completed activities.
Toggle the featured status of an activity. Requires authentication.
Delete an activity permanently. Only creator can delete.
Get upcoming music activities (concerts, live bands, etc.)
Get free sports activities
Get featured upcoming activities
Check if the activity scheduler is running. The scheduler automatically updates activity statuses based on time (upcoming  live  completed).
Manually trigger the scheduler to update activity statuses immediately (instead of waiting for the next cron run). Useful for testing. Check server console for results.
Create a test activity that automatically goes LIVE in 1 minute and COMPLETES in 3 minutes. Perfect for testing the automatic scheduler. Watch server console for status change logs.
